data.description: 新的一天，祝你开心！-------------【新增】增加底部Mini播放器，可以随时回到主播放器页面【新增】跟读的录音可以保存和分享了，方便将录制的音频分享给老师点评【优化】调整AB断点文字排版，更方便阅读
data.description_en: [New] Add Mini player at the bottom, you can go back to the main player page at any time[New] Recording after the reading can be saved and shared, easy to share the recorded audio with the teacher[Optimization] Adjust AB breakpoint text typesetting to make it easier to read
